mapper.select: select contest_id, name, type_code, register_count, start_time, end_time, explain, create_id, create_time, update_last_id, update_last_time, register_start_time, register_end_time, status_code, time_length, public_code, register_code, rating, rating_code, rank_code, rank_is_final, final_time, raking_final from oj.contest where contest_id = #{contestId}

select contest_id, name, type_code, register_count, start_time, end_time, explain, create_id, create_time, update_last_id, update_last_time, register_start_time, register_end_time, status_code, time_length, public_code, register_code, rating, rating_code, rank_code, rank_is_final, final_time, raking_final from oj.contest limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into oj.contest(name, type_code, register_count, start_time, end_time, explain, create_id, create_time, update_last_id, update_last_time, register_start_time, register_end_time, status_code, time_length, public_code, register_code, rating, rating_code, rank_code, rank_is_final, final_time) values (#{name}, #{typeCode}, #{registerCount}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{explain}, #{createId}, #{createTime}, #{updateLastId}, #{updateLastTime}, #{registerStartTime}, #{registerEndTime}, #{statusCode}, #{timeLength}, #{publicCode}, #{registerCode}, #{rating}, #{ratingCode}, #{rankCode}, #{rankIsFinal}, #{finalTime})
mapper.update:
update oj.contest
name = #{name},
type_code = #{typeCode},
register_count = #{registerCount},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
explain = #{explain},
create_id = #{createId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_last_id = #{updateLastId},
update_last_time = #{updateLastTime},
register_start_time = #{registerStartTime},
register_end_time = #{registerEndTime},
status_code = #{statusCode},
time_length = #{timeLength},
public_code = #{publicCode},
register_code = #{registerCode},
rating = #{rating},
rating_code = #{ratingCode},
rank_code = #{rankCode},
rank_is_final = #{rankIsFinal},
final_time = #{finalTime},
where contest_id = #{contestId}
